Community Hub
LYNE
Deceptively simple. Infinitely complex. LYNE is a minimalist puzzle game that will knot your brain as it calms your soul. Connect the shapes. Fill the board. Lose yourself in the interflowing paths of LYNE.
User reviews: Overwhelmingly Positive (3,264 reviews) - 97% of the 3,264 user reviews for this game are positive.
Release Date: Mar 17, 2014

About This Game

Deceptively simple. Infinitely complex. LYNE is a minimalist puzzle game that will knot your brain as it calms your soul.

Connect the shapes. Fill the board. Lose yourself in the interflowing paths of LYNE.

Features
- Hundreds of pre-built puzzles
- An infinite number of procedurally-generated puzzles, released daily
- Slick, intuitive interface
- Soothing dynamic audio
- Unlockable colour palettes
READ MORE

Posted: September 7
Honestly, I bought this game because I can achieve their achievements and write my name on my profile. I like this game because it is pretty awesome which helps to improve my analytical thinking skills. This game is simple yet brilliant that'll help me to visualize potential problems. This game involves a methodical step-by-step approach to thinking that allows you to break down complex problems.

My suggestion is don't give up.

9/10

stubar
1,080 products in account
51 reviews
Recommended
6.7 hrs on record
Posted: July 4
Simply idea, not always so simple solutions!

Very worth it at full price, which isn't much! Hundreds of levels built-in, with the addition of many daily puzzles each day.

Even with the toughest puzzles there aren't many (but some!) stagnent brain-freeze moments. It doesn't get too frustrating and is easy to leave after a session and come back 30 minutes later to beat up some more levels!

Nice mechanics, great value!

kze / Exam Studies. 6th-9th Nov
127 products in account
7 reviews
Recommended
18.4 hrs on record
Posted: August 8
Actually, let's all be honest. We bought this game to "Achievement Showcase" words on our profiles.

LYNE is a logic puzzle game. It's calming and relaxing to play, the background music suits in with it. The price for the game is worth the game, there are many different levels and also different daily challenges for you to solve. In this game, there is the alphabet set, set A-Z. You need to connect the shapes to finish each levels.

At first, the game is easy as ripping a piece of paper. As you soon move onto the next 25-30 levels, it's like ripping a phone book. The puzzle you need to solve really digs your brain in, and according to a study, playing puzzle games make you smarter. This is one the games that really keep you thinking. There are unlockable colour palettes, soothing music, great built-in puzzles and new puzzle challenges for you to solve daily. LYNE brings you extravagent puzzle fun and would be recommened for all puzzle lovers.

LYNE is a really kick-back and chilling game, definitely calms your souls and nerves with the gentle, soothing and alleviating music.

I also did purchase this game for the achievements but I ended enjoying this game. Brilliant work!

8/10
